About Me

This is what I do.

Hi!

My name is Evan Stoddard. I'm an embedded software engineer living in Nashville, TN originally from Buffalo, NY (go Bills!)

I graduated from Clarkson University in 2019 with a degree in Computer Engineering. My interests were primarily set in FPGA designs dealing with various communication protocols (AXI, PCIe, etc.) I furthered developed these skills working for Lockheed Martin for ~2 years.

I currently work for Skip Line, LLC working on making roadways safer as well as trying to modernize infrastructure.

This site is a collection of various projects I'm working on. Some techincal, some not. Please enjoy and if anything sparks interest, please feel free to reach out!
